case_title: United States of America v. Reese et al
case_info_full_case_name: United States of America v. Reese et al

charges.charge_description: 21:846 and 21:841(a)(1) and (b)(1)(A) Knowingly and intentionally conspire to possess with intent to distribute and distribute five or more kilograms of a mixture or substance containing a detectable amount of cocaine, a Schedule II Narcotic Drug Controlled Substance.
21:846 Conspiracy to Possess with Intent to Distribute and Distribute Cocaine(1)

charges.charge_disposition: 144 months custody; 8 years supervised release; $100 special assessment. 7/9/15 144 months custody REDUCED to 120 months
60 months custody; 5 years supervised release; $100 special assessment

charges.charge_description: 21:846 and 21:841(a)(1) and (b)(1)(A) Knowingly and intentionally conspire to possess with intent to distribute and distribute five or more kilograms of a mixture or substance containing a detectable amount of cocaine, a Schedule II Narcotic Drug Controlled Substance.
21:846 Conspiracy to Possess with Intent to Distribute and Distribute Cocaine(1)

charges.charge_disposition: 144 months custody; 8 years supervised release; $100.00 special assessment. 5/5/15 - 144 months custody reduced to 120 months
60 months custody; 5 years supervised release; $100 special assessment

charges.charge_description: 21:846 and 21:841(a)(1) and (b)(1)(A) Knowingly and intentionally conspire to possess with intent to distribute and distribute five or more kilograms of a mixture or substance containing a detectable amount of cocaine, a Schedule II Narcotic Drug Controlled Substance.
21:846 Conspiracy to Possess with Intent to Distribute and Distribute Cocaine(1)

charges.charge_disposition: 120 months custody ; 5 years supervised release; $100.00 special assessment
60 months custody to run consecutive to Count 1; 5 years supervised release; $100.00 special assessment.

charges.charge_description: 21:846 and 21:841(a)(1) and (b)(1)(A) Knowingly and intentionally conspire to possess with intent to distribute and distribute five or more kilograms of a mixture or substance containing a detectable amount of cocaine, a Schedule II Narcotic Drug Controlled Substance.
21:846 Conspiracy to Possess with Intent to Distribute and Distribute Cocaine(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to 120 months on Count 1 and 60 months on Count 2; terms to be consecutively. 5 years supervised release on Count 1 and 5 years supervised release on Count 2 to run concurrent. Fine waived. Recommendation: Defendant shall receive medical treatment. Special Assessment $200.00
